name: Transform Your Space with the Enchanted Rainbow Forest Blanket—A Dreamy Blend of Nature’s Magic and Festival Vibes
description:
* Material: Lightweight Flannel fabric for autumn winter blanket

* Style: One-side printing and long-term use do not fade

* Other side made by high quality and soft flannel white style

* Sizes: 4 Sized available for your home relax bedroom sofa

* Widely used also for outdoors as a beach towel, picnic mat, tablecloth,etc.

* Care Instruction: Wash by hand or gently by machine, iron at low temperature or in the air


PREMIUM QUALITY - This horizontal flannel breathable blanket is made of lightweight flannel fabric, which is smooth and breathable. Quality constructed to be long-lasting with wrinkle and fade resistance, silky, warm and cozy, it is the perfect blanket throw for autumn-winter.

MACHINE WASHALBLE - This blanket it's designed for everyday use, super easy to care. Wash simply separately in cold water or machine wash and dry with cold water cycle. Do not bleach or dry clean.

MULTIPURPOSE USE - This flannel blanket will be a perfect indoor decoration for your home, bedroom, living room, dorm room, also goes well with a patio porch, couch, sofa. It’s also a wonderful experience when surround yourself with blankets while watching TV series with a mug of hot chocolate.

PERFECT GIFT CHOICE - Flannel blankets will be a perfect present for any occasion, birthday, Christmas, and other family holidays.

name: Rainbow Heartburst Flannel Blanket
description:
Spread the love and warmth with the "Rainbow Heartburst Flannel Blanket." This cozy flannel blanket features a vibrant, psychedelic tie-dye design with radiant heart-shaped bursts in a spectrum of colors. Perfect for adding a cheerful and loving touch to your home, this blanket is as soft as it is eye-catching. Whether you’re cuddling up on the couch or packing it for a camping festival, this blanket brings comfort and positive vibes wherever you go. Let the rainbow hearts wrap you in warmth and joy, making every moment feel special.

name: Ocean Breeze Tie-Dye Flannel Blanket
description:
Immerse yourself in the tranquil vibes of the "Ocean Breeze Tie-Dye Flannel Blanket." This serene design features cool blue and white tie-dye patterns reminiscent of ocean waves and coastal skies, perfect for bringing a touch of the seaside into your home. Whether you’re snuggling up on the couch, adding a stylish layer to your bed, or taking it along to a beachside festival, this blanket offers both comfort and a splash of soothing color. Its versatile design makes it ideal for both indoor relaxation and outdoor adventures, allowing you to carry the calming energy of the ocean with you wherever you go.

name: Psychedelic Starburst Tie-Dye Flannel Blanket
description:
Immerse yourself in vibrant energy with the "Psychedelic Starburst Tie-Dye Flannel Blanket." This visually striking blanket showcases bold, swirling patterns of blues, purples, and greens that radiate like cosmic bursts. Perfect for adding a touch of retro flair to your home décor or for keeping warm during those cool festival nights, this blanket is as versatile as it is eye-catching. Whether you're lounging at home, camping under the stars, or making a statement at a music festival, this blanket combines comfort and style in the most colorful way possible.
